text: 18.8: Jer 50.34; VB 11.17; 17.16; 18.10Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbarkɨrga simtɨgi mbatɨgi guarira mba ra bavira ana hegɨrga. Rɨmrɨɨ mbatɨgi vhɨrve, nta anan vhen ki gumgi vhɨrver hɨrga, mbe nzi mbatɨgar muunga, vhɨra thi mbatɨgi hav, thir vhɨzi tuga mbatɨk vhɨra anan vhen ki gumgi gu mbigir hɨrga. Babiron ŋgu bakɨme vhav ana hɨgɨp, za ana shigirga. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, anan tɨvi mbatɨgi ga nzuav, ana garav, ana nzuai Guma Bakɨme, ana Fhe Bakɨme ma, ana guigira ŋkasŋka bakɨme ki.
